### Change is on previous commit
#### Insert first line
a b c d e -> z a b c d e
z a b c d e

#### Insert in middle
a b c d e -> a b z c d e
a b z c d e

#### Insert last line
a b c d e -> a b c d e z
a b c d e z


### Change is on 2nd previous commit
#### Insert first line
a b c d e   -> z a b c d e
a b c d e f -> z a b c d e f
z a b c d e f

#### Insert in middle
a b c d e   -> a b z c d e
a b c d e f -> a b z c d e f
a b z c d e f

#### Insert last line
a b c d e -> a b c d e z
a b f c d e -> a b f c d e z
a b f c d e z


### Progressive
#### Insert first line
a -> z a
a b -> z a b
a b c -> z a b c
z a b c

#### Insert in middle (SKIP)
# Execution depends on "insert_checks"
a
a b
a b c
a b c d
a b z c d

#### Insert last line
a
a b
a b c -> a b c z
a b c z


### Progressive from end
#### Insert first line
c
b c
a b c -> z a b c
z a b c

#### Insert in middle (checks above)
%run {insert_checks: :above}
d
c d
b c d -> b z c d
a b c d -> a b z c d
a b z c d

#### Insert in middle (checks below) (SKIP)
%run {insert_checks: :below}
%test {nb_merge_conflicts: 1}
d
c d -> z c d
b c d -> b z c d
a b c d -> a b z c d
a b z c d

#### Insert in middle (checks around)
%run {insert_checks: :around}
d
c d
b c d
a b c d
a b z c d

#### Insert in middle (checks recent)
%run {insert_checks: :recent}
d
c d
b c d -> b z c d
a b c d -> a b z c d
a b z c d

#### Insert last line
c -> c z
b c -> b c z
a b c -> a b c z
a b c z


### TODO: Check when there is no final new_line and when there are
